description: Try our easy to follow Baked Snapper recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fish dishes,Pescatarian,Fish,Quick & easy dinner,Wheat free,Gluten free,Egg free,Sesame free
name: Baked Snapper Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C and grill to high. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper. Rinse fish and pat dry with paper towel and transfer to baking trays.

Cut slashes into thickest part of fish, for even cooking. Drizzle with half the oil and season. Grill for 23 minutes each side, swapping trays, or until golden. Transfer to oven and bake for 8-10 minutes or until tender.
Meanwhile, combine garlic and ginger with remaining oil and lay on a separate tray. Grill for 2 minutes until golden.
Transfer fish to a platter. Top with garlic, ginger, onion and coriander. Serve with lime.
